markdownRemark.html:
Background

Some people said, “A year in the JavaScript world is equal to 10 years in the outside world.” It maybe a bit of exaggerated, but it shed some light on the learning hell of a frontend developer.

Allow me to share the frontend developer roadmap from Kamran Ahmed, if you want to be a frontend developer in 2018, you would require to learn preprocessors, package managers, frameworks, build tools, and etc. The list keeps going on and honestly it is tough to keep up with all the new things that’s coming out.

frontmatter.title: Understand the frontend tools
frontmatter.description: About the tools frontend developer used in 2019
